POST /api/users.description: accepts user details and adds the user to the database

POST /api/sessions.description: accepts login details and creates a user session if login details are valid

DELETE /api/sessions.description: deletes user session if the user has a valid session cookie

POST /api/workspaces.description: accepts workspace name and adds the workspace to the database

GET /api/workspaces.description: sends an array of logged in user's workspaces

PATCH /api/workspaces/:workspace_id/name.description: accepts workspace name and renames an existing workspace

PATCH /api/workspaces/:workspace_id/user.description: adds logged in user ID to users array of an existing workspace

DELETE /api/workspaces/:workspace_id/use.description: removes user ID from users array of an existing workspace and deletes workspace from the database if users array becomes empty
